value.message: Uses error log level for recoverable transformation failure; should use warn for non-critical issues.
value.suggestion: Change logger.error to logger.warn for recoverable transformation failures.

value.message: Uses error log level for recoverable batch transformation failure; should use warn for non-critical issues.
value.suggestion: Change logger.error to logger.warn for recoverable batch transformation failures.

value.message: Condition evaluation errors default to allow (returns true), violating 'deny by default' principle for access control logic.
value.suggestion: Change the default return value in evaluateCondition to false on error to ensure secure failure.
